doc:
Duane Jones https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Duane_Jones 0 Duane L. Jones (February 2, 1937 – July 22, 1988) was an American actor, best known for his leading role as Ben in the 1968 horror film Night of the Living Dead. He was director of the Maguire Theater at the State University of New York at Old Westbury, and the artistic director of the Richard Allen Center for Culture and Art in Manhattan. Duane_L._Jones ( February_2_,_1937 – July_22_,_1988 ) was an_American_actor , best_known for his_leading_role as Ben in the_1968_horror_film_Night of the_Living_Dead . He was director of the_Maguire_Theater at the_State_University of New_York at Old_Westbury , and the_artistic_director of the_Richard_Allen_Center for Culture_and_Art in Manhattan .
